title: Word for Word
description: An interactive quote-guessing web app built using Python, and created and deployed using Streamlit, web scraping, and an external SQL database.

title: Project Portfolio
description: A project showcase website built using Python, and created an deployed using Streamlit. This web app displays projects I created, and it has a feature that allows any user to send me an email through the Contact Me page.

title: To-Do List
description: A desktop GUI project built using Python, which allows user to add and complete tasks throughout the day. This helps with organization and keeping track of to-do's.

title: Above & Beyond
description: A web app built using Python, and created and deployed using Streamlit. It serves the purpose of providing weather forecasting data, and daily astronomy info, utilizing multiple REST APIs to fetch this data based on location/days selected by user.

title: Healthy Habit Helper
description: A C++ terminal-based program to help user keep track of habits to maintain and encourage a healthy lifestyle. It also serves to improve mental health through helpful tips and positive messaging.

title: Dungeon Escape
description: A C++ terminal-based game that descriptively takes the user on a dungeon adventure full of dangers and challenges. The user must overcome various challenges in order to survive and escape the dungeon.
